V05n743:2: ye ca te bodhisattvānāṃ trayaḥ śīlaskandhā uktāḥ |
V05n743:3: saṃvara śīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca teṣu śikṣitukāmena gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmmikasya bodhisattvasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya vāg vijñaptyartha grahaṇāvabodhasamarthasya pādayornnipatyādhyeṣaṇā kāryā |
V05n743:6: trirevamadhyeṣya ekāṃsamuttarāṅgaṃ kṛtvādaśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ saṃsthāpya saṃpūjya puraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ |
V05n743:7: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti |
V05n743:9: na cirasyedānī me'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti |
V05n743:11: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo'vikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ |
V05n743:12: śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ |
V05n743:15: pratīcchasi tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo'si bodhau kṛtapraṇidhāno mamāntikāt sarvvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca yacchīlamatītānāṃ bodhisattvanāmabhūt yāni ca śikṣāpadāni |
V05n743:16: yacchīlamanāgatānām bodhisattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni |
V05n743:17: yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bhavati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni |
V05n743:18: yeṣu ca śikṣāpadeṣu yeṣu śīleṣvatītāḥ sarvvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ |
V05n743:22: samanvāharantu māṃ daśadiglokadhānusannipatitā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāḥ |
V05n743:23: samanvāharatvācāryyo'hamevannāmā yatkiñcitkāyavāṅmanobhirbuddha bodhisattvān mātāpitarau tadanyān vā sattvān samāgamyehajanmanyanyeṣu vā janmāṃ tareṣu mayāpāyaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritamanumoditam vā tat sarvvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāmācāryyasya cāntike'grayā pravarayā pratideśanayā pratideśayāmi jānan smaran na praticchādayāmi || trirevam ||
V05n743:24: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya āvodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahākārūṇikaṃ sarvvajñaṃ sarvvadarśinaṃ sarvvavairabhayātītaṃ mahāpuruṣamabhedyakāyamanuttarakāyaṃ dharmmakāyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam ||
V05n743:25: so'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍadiṣadanāddharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi śāntaṃ virāgāṇāṃ pravaram |
V05n743:26: so'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanādavaivarttikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇāṇāṃ śreṣṭham || trirevam ||
V05n743:27: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyayastriśaraṇagato'nantasattvadhātūttāraṇāyābhyuddharaṇāya saṃsāraduḥkhāt paritrāṇāya sarvvajñajñāne anuttare pratiṣṭhāpanāya |
V05n743:28: yathā te atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā bodhicittamutpādya buddhatvamadhigatavanto'dhigamiṣyanti adhigacchanti ca |
V05n743:29: yathā sarvvabuddhā'nāvaraṇena buddhajñānena buddh cakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti yathā dharmmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāma (?) nujānanti |
V05n743:30: tena vidhinā ahamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmna ācāryyasyāntikāt sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ ca purato'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayāmi || trirevam ||
V05n743:31: idaṃ cāhamatyayadeśanātriśaraṇagamanabodhicittotpādajanitaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi yadahaṃ loke aśaraṇe alayane aparāyaṇe'dvipe trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ layaṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ dvīpo bhaveyam |
V05n743:36: pratigṛhya ca yathāśakti yathābalam yathājñānaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samāropayāmi |
V05n743:37: itaḥ prabhṛti yatkiñcit dānaṃ dāsyāmi śīlaṃ rakṣiṣyāmi kṣāṃti saṃpādayiṣyāmi vīryamārabhya dhyānaṃ samāpatsye prajñayā vyavacāryya upāyakauśalyaṃ vā śikṣiṣye tat sarvvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ||
V05n743:38: uttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya teṣāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikāṇāṃ mahāyāne sāmicīmanupravrajāmi |
V05n743:39: anupravrajya bodhisattvo'haṃ bodhisattva iti māmitaḥ prabhṛtyācāryyo dhārayatu || trirevam ||
V05n743:40: tatastenācāryyeṇa tasyāḥ pratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornnipatya sāmicīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam |
V05n743:41: gṛhītamanenaivaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mamaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt yāvat trirapi bodhisatvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam |
V05n743:42: sohamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtaṃ prajānan asyaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryyāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvvasattvānāṃ viparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśadikṣvanantāparyyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmi |
V05n743:44: evaṃ punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmmasamāptyanantaraṃ dharmmatā khalveṣā yad daśasu dikṣvanantāparyyantesu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ tadrupaṃ nimittam prādurbhavati yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati |
V05n743:45: evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvara samādānaṃ samāttamiti ||
V05n743:47: yadi tairguṇairyuktaḥ pudgalo na sannihitaḥ syāt tato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne vacanīyam |
V05n743:49: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukena vā idam syādvacanīyam |
V05n743:50: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi |
V05n743:51: teṣāṃ purataḥ sarvvāṇi bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvaṃ ca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade |
V05n743:52: yacchīlamityādi pūrvvavat yāvat bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti |
V05n743:53: māmitaḥ prabhṛti buddha bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca dhārayantviti vijñaptiḥ ||0 ||
